description.text:
Beginning at 1st level, when a dragon hunter successfully uses Survival to spot the trail of a creature of the dragon type, the hunter may attempt an immediate DC 15 Knowledge (arcana) check.
On a success, the dragon hunter is able to deduce the species, age category, size, and color of the dragon. If the trail is less than 48 hours old, the dragon hunter gains a +2 circumstance bonus on the Knowledge check.
